    Server - Class in ServerClient

    showDeck() - Method in class Game.Deck
    Prints the current contents of the deck to the console, mainly for debugging purposes.
    showThreeRemovedCards() - Method in class Game.Deck
    Returns a string representation of the three cards that were removed from the deck.
    shuffleDeck() - Method in class Game.Deck
    Shuffles the deck of cards to randomize the order.
    shutdown() - Method in class ServerClient.Client
    Shuts down the client by closing the input and output streams, the socket, and setting the done flag to true to stop the InputHandler thread.
    shutdownClient() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Shuts down the client connection and releases resources.
    shutdownServer() - Method in class ServerClient.Server
    Shuts down the server, closing the socket and shutting down the thread pool.
